product_name: Royal Robbins Kickback Crossover V-Neck Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made with 100% soft cotton, the Royal Robbins Kickback Crossover V-neck shirt is a comfortable top for your active, everyday adventures. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Crossover detailing at the neck adds a little flair. Closeout.
short_description: Made with 100% soft cotton, the Royal Robbins Kickback Crossover V-neck shirt is a comfortable top for your active, everyday adventures.
